titles.title: Master Speak Thy Servant Heareth (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Master, speak, Thy servant heareth Waiting for Thy gracious word Longing for Thy voice that cheereth Master, let it now be heard I am listening, Lord, for Thee What hast Thou to say to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Often through my heart is pealing Many another voice than Thine Many an unwilled echo stealing From the walls of this Thy shrine Let Thy longed-for accents fall Master speak and silence all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Master, speak, though least and lowest Let me not unheard depart Master, speak, for O Thou knowest All the yearning of my heart Knowest all its truest need Speak and make me blest indeed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Master, speak, and make me ready When Thy voice is truly heard With obedience glad and steady Still to follow every word I am listening, Lord, for Thee Master, speak, O speak to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Speak to me by name, O Master Let me know it is to me Speak that I may follow faster With a step more firm and free Where the Shepherd leads the flock In the shadow of the Rock{/lang-eng}
